Accordion.description: Collapsible content container for organizing sections.

AlertDialog.description: A dialog that interrupts the user with important information.

Avatar.description: Displays user profile image or initials.

Badge.description: A small status indicator or tag label.

Button.description: Primary button component with variants and sizes.

Toggle.description: A two-state button that can be pressed or unpressed.

Collapsible.description: Reveals or hides content with smooth animation.

Dialog.description: Displays an overlay or modal for user interactions.

AspectRatio.description: Maintains a consistent width-to-height ratio for its content.

theme.description: Globalized theme variant utilities used by all components.
